summary: Watch out for Draugr and their improved wares! They\'re now more challenging than ever!
descriptionHtml:
DESCRIPTION
================

What I have done is I have tweaked values for ALL Ancient Nordic Wares in the Creation Kit. Due to this tweaking, Draugr may be a little unbeatable. YOU may be unbeatable, also as a result of this tweaking.

SUSPECTED BUGS
===================

- You may be killed in one hit by Draugr as a result of their weapons being tweaked.
+ To combat this bug, learn all of the Fire Breath Shout words and use that on the Draugr - It\'s super effective!

I am also the authour of the \"Improved Ebony Wares\" mod, and the installation instructions are as basic as any other single-file mod.
author: 3VegasModder343
